head.title: {{ProgLang}} .NET Document Conversion API | Convert PDF Word Excel PPTX HTML Images
head.description: {{ProgLang}} .NET Document Conversion API. Convert PDF Word DOC DOCX, Excel Spreadsheets PPT PPTX, HTML, PSD, MPT MPP, Email MSG EMLX, AutoCAD & image file formats.

header.title: .NET API to Convert 80+ File Formats
header.description: Simple API to Integrate Document & Image Conversion Functionality into .NET Applications without Installing any External Software.

overview.content1: {{ProductFullName}} offers simple set of APIs, enabling developers to build powerful document conversion applications in {{ProgLang}}, ASP.NET and other .NET related technologies. {{ProductFullName}} API provides fast, efficient and reliable file conversion solution to your end-users. It supports performing accurate conversions among all popular business document formats including: PDF, HTML, Email, Microsoft Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Project, Photoshop, CorelDraw, AutoCAD, diagrams, raster image file formats and many more. The document converter library auto-detects source document format and gives you all the control to convert either the whole document or specific pages to the desired output format. Itâ€™s easier to replace missing fonts with preferred ones and add text or image watermarks to any document page.
overview.content2: {{ProductFullName}} can be used to develop applications in any development environment that targets .NET platform. It is compatible with all .NET based languages and supports popular operating systems (Windows, Linux, MacOS) where Mono or .NET frameworks (including .NET Core) can be installed.

tab_two.description: {{ProductFullName}} supports converting between all popular and commonly used [document file formats](https://docs.groupdocs.com/conversion/net/supported-document-formats/).

left.title: Convert From:
left.content1: * **Documents**: DOC, DOCX, DOCM, DOT, DOTX, DOTM, RTF, TXT, ODT, OTT
left.content2: * **Spreadsheets**: XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB, CSV, XLS2003, ODS, TSV, XLT, XLTX, XLTM, XLAM, FODS, SXC
left.content3: * **Presentations**: PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX, ODP, POT, POTX, POTM, PPTM, PPSM, FODP
left.content4: * **Images**: TIF, TIFF, JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, ICO, DIB, JPC, JPEG-LS, JPEG2000
left.content12: * **Diagrams**: VSD, VSDX, VSDM, VSS, VSSM, VST, VSTM, VSX, VTX, VDW, VDX, SVG, SVGZ
left.content13: * **AutoCAD**: DXF, DWG, DWF, STL, IFC, DWT
left.content16: * **Other**: VCF, PLT, LGS, OTG, MD, AI, LOG

right.title: Convert To:
right.content1: * **Documents**: DOC, DOCX, DOCM, DOT, DOTX, DOTM, RTF, TXT, ODT, OTT
right.content2: * **Spreadsheets**: XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB, CSV, XLS2003, TSV, XLTX, ODS, XLAM, FODS, DIF, SXC
right.content3: * **Presentations**: PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX, ODP, POTX, POTM, PPTM, PPSM, FODP
right.content4: * **Images**: TIF, TIFF, JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, ICO, JPEG2000

tab_three.description: {{ProductFullName}} supports following Operating Systems, Frameworks & Package Managers:

features.title: {{ProductFullName}} Features
features.content2: Set Default Zoom Option when Converting to Words, Slides or Cells
features.content3: Convert to/from all Popular Raster Image Formats & Assign Image DPI, Height & Width
features.content4: Convert PDF & Image to Grayscale & Linearize PDF Document for the Web
features.content5: Specify Bookmark Level, Heading Level and Expanded Level in Word to PDF/XPS Conversion
features.content6: Configure & Place Watermark in Converted Document as Background to Display Behind Text
features.content7: Render Email Header during Conversion from Email
features.content8: Set Custom Font Directories & Explicitly Load/Substitute Font during Document Conversion
features.content9: Set Default Font to Replace Missing Fonts for Documents, Slides & Spreadsheets Conversion
features.content10: Advanced Conversion Methods to return the Output as Path or IO Stream
features.content11: Convert Spreadsheet with Grid-lines & Remove Comments from Slides While Conversion
features.content12: Convert Specific Document Pages as PDF Format & Convert Specific Cell Range in Spreadsheets
features.content13: Show Hidden Sheets & Skip Empty Rows and Columns while Converting Spreadsheets
features.content14: Count Total Pages of a Document & Set Password to Unprotected Document during Conversion
features.content15: Option to Remove Annotations & Embedded Files from PDF
features.content16: Create HTML 5 Compliant Markup when Converting to HTML
features.content17: Auto-detect Source Type & Return all Possible Conversions when Converting from Stream
features.content18: Ability to Return Each Page in Separate Stream while Converting to PDF or HTML
features.content19: Show/Hide Markup, Comments & Track Changes while Converting from Word
features.content20: DOCX to Tiff G3 Conversion with Shading Option
features.content21: Convert Specific Layouts when Converting from CAD Document
features.content22: Automatic Naming when Saving Converted Document to File
features.content23: Metered Licensing Supported to be Billed based on the Usage of the API
features.content24: Convert Diagrams to Word Processing File Formats
features.content25: Add Page Numbers while Converting HTML to Wordprocessing Document
features.content26: Convert XML Documents to Any Format without Transformation
features.content27: Monitor File Conversion Progress (Start, End) Directly from Client-side Application

more_feature.content1: Using {{ProductFullName}}, converting document file format is very easy. Following example shows you how to convert a PDF file into a DOC file using {{ProgLang}}:
more_feature.step_1: Create an instance of the Converter class and provide the file with the full path
more_feature.step_2: Create and set ConvertOptions for desired target type.
more_feature.step_3: Call the Converter.Convert method and pass the full path and format as a parameter
more_feature.content2: {{ProductFullName}} can be used to develop applications in any development environment that targets .NET platform. It is compatible with all .NET based languages and supports popular operating systems (Windows, Linux, MacOS) where Mono or .NET frameworks (including .NET Core) can be installed.
